participant_1.background: my husband is adopted. i live is a rural farming community. i've a german shepherd dog. i like to watch nhl hockey.

participant_2.background: i'm a retired gym teacher. cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i was poor growing up. i volunteer at a soup kitchen. i like watching war documentaries.

content.text: hello, how are you? I am a rural hockey community. what do you do?
